root.name: Harvest Moon: Another Wonderful Life
root.description: OverviewHarvest Moon: Another Wonderful Life is a farming simulation game for the Nintendo GameCube that was developed by Marvelous Interactive.FeaturesThe game is essentially the same as the earlier GameCube title Harvest Moon: A Wonderful Life except that you now get to play as a female protagonist, and are given the choice of three different bachelors to marry. Another new feature is the introduction of eight different outfits that can be obtained to change the look and appearance of your main character.The game also offers connectivity with the Game Boy Advance title Harvest Moon: More Friends of Mineral Town, which itself is the female version of Harvest Moon: Friends of Mineral Town.This new title features no changes to the traditional Harvest Moon style of gameplay or to the setting of Forget-Me-Not Valley that was featured in A Wonderful Life.ReceptionThe game received a relatively poor critical reception, with many reviewers commenting on the similarity to Harvest Moon: A Wonderful Life, and the lack of new features.
